name: abstract
description: Abstract art prompts covering geometric patterns, color fields, and digital art
prompts: a geometric pattern of interlocking triangles in gradient blue and gold
a color field painting with bold blocks of red, yellow, and blue
a fluid marble texture with swirling veins of white, black, and gold
a fractal spiral pattern with infinite recursive detail in neon colors
long exposure light trails from cars on a highway at night
an abstract expressionist painting with energetic splashes of paint
a kaleidoscope pattern with symmetrical shapes and vibrant colors
a digital glitch art piece with distorted pixels and chromatic aberration
a minimalist zen circle painted with a single brush stroke on white paper
an op art illusion of concentric circles creating a sense of depth and motion
